sn29.5:4.2: Ekamantaṃ nisinno kho so bhikkhu bhagavantaṃ etadavoca:
sn29.5:4.3: “ko nu kho, bhante, hetu, ko paccayo, yena midhekacce saṃsedajā nāgā uposathaṃ upavasanti vossaṭṭhakāyā ca bhavantī”ti?
sn29.5:4.5: “Ayaṃ kho, bhikkhu, hetu, ayaṃ paccayo, yena midhekacce saṃsedajā nāgā uposathaṃ upavasanti vossaṭṭhakāyā ca bhavantī”ti.
